modules.description: This module constructs JSON schema expressions for OCaml AST nodes, providing operations to create schema values for primitives, arrays, tuples, enums, and type references. It works directly with `Ppxlib_ast.Ast.expression` and `Ppxlib.location` to build schema representations programmatically. Concrete use cases include generating JSON schemas for OCaml types during compilation, supporting validation and documentation tools.

This module generates JSON schemas from OCaml type declarations by converting type expressions into schema definitions, encoding variants and polymorphic types, and constructing object schemas from labeled fields. It operates on AST nodes to enable programmatic schema creation and customization, supporting use cases like automatic API documentation, data validation, and serialization format alignment.

This module generates JSON Schema documents with customizable metadata like version, title, and description. It works with polymorphic variant types to construct schema definitions and associate them with identifiers. Concrete use cases include validating data structures in web APIs and generating schema documentation for OCaml types.
